sn24.18:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.18:1.3: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.18:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.18:2.2: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti …pe….
sn24.18:3.4: viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.5: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.18:3.7: “Yampidam dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn24.18:3.9: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn24.18:3.11: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.12: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.18:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imesu ca thanesu kankha pahina hoti, dukkhepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhasamudayepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhanirodhepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadayapissa kankha pahina hoti—
sn24.18:4.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
sn24.18:5.2: so atta no ca me siya;
sn24.18:6.3: Anantava ca tam jivam tam sariranti,
sn24.18:7.3: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati.
